title: Junior Engineer
description:
**Job Description Summary**
===========================


As part of the GE India Multi-modal Manufacturing team, Quality engineer is responsible for establishing an efficient and continually improving In-process quality systems as per AS 9100 / ISO 9001. This person will own developing and executing the MRB process & Need to handle MRB for the fabrication COE , in process quality inspections to address the key Quality deliverables in the project including analysis.**Job Description**
===================

**Essential Responsibilities:**

* The position will report to the Quality Manager
* Responsible to carry out control of inventory in MRB & drive improvement in cost of quality
* Responsible for daily management of CFT trolley for NC parts dispositions
* Work closely with CFT/ Quality system teams to develop and implement AS 9100 / NC management procedures : understand requirements for certification, timing, and own all improvement actions necessary to obtain certifications,
* Coordinate for Quality training needs. Facilitate, train, and coach cross-functional employees in the use of quality tools as appropriate
* Initiate the continual improvement through quality audit programs, through the assessment / screening of various sources of non-conformances and by driving the implementation or corrective actions identified through Root Cause Analysis for In process improvements.
* Develop & Monitor all quality parameters for in process & quality equipment’s. Implementation of a comprehensive communication plan to support the quality strategy and establish a climate that encourages an open communication for employees to exchange ideas / suggestions

 **Qualifications/Requirements:**

* Highest Levels of Personal Integrity and Safety Mindset.
* First Class Diploma in Mechanical Engineering.
* 2+ Years of Experience in Engineering industry (Fabrication / Aviation industry using NDT extensively) – with firsthand experience with a Quality Management system
* Working knowledge of AS 9100 & S1000 and its application in a complex business. Requirements of implementation.

 **Desired Characteristics:**

* Humble: respectful, receptive, agile, eager to learn
* Transparent: shares critical information, speaks with candor, contributes constructively
* Focused: quick learner, strategically prioritizes work, committed
* Leadership ability: strong communicator, decision-maker, collaborative
* Problem solver: analytical-minded, challenges existing processes, critical thinker
* Knowledge of Lean and Six Sigma Methodology
* Fluent in English and Hindi Language (Written and Spoken) Marathi Language Skills (Verbal & Written)

**Additional Information**
==========================

**Relocation Assistance Provided:** Yes

title: Calibration Engineer
description:
**Job Title: Calibration and Testing Engineer (Civil/Mechanical)**

**Position Type:** Full-Time

**About Us:**

Shree Trading Company, a leading NABL (National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories) accredited Calibration and Testing Laboratory, is seeking a dedicated and experienced Calibration and Testing Engineer to join our team. As a key player in quality assurance and reliability testing, we are committed to delivering precision and excellence in all our projects.

**Job Overview:**

We are looking for a highly motivated and skilled Civil/Mechanical Engineer to perform site calibration and laboratory testing activities in accordance with NABL standards. The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring the accuracy and reliability of measurements and test results, contributing to the quality and safety of products and systems.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**On-Site Calibration:**Perform calibration of civil and mechanical instruments and equipment at client sites.  
Ensure compliance with NABL standards and guidelines throughout the calibration process.  
Maintain detailed records of calibration procedures and results.  
Troubleshoot and rectify any calibration issues to maintain accuracy.

**Lab Testing:**Conduct various mechanical and civil engineering tests in the laboratory environment.  
Prepare and set up test specimens and equipment as per project requirements.  
Monitor and document testing procedures and outcomes, ensuring data accuracy.  
Collaborate with other team members to conduct comprehensive tests.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field.
* Proficiency in operating and maintaining a wide range of civil and mechanical instruments and equipment.
* Detail-oriented with a strong commitment to accuracy and precision.

title: Project Manager
company: BLUEWING DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION PVT LTD
description:
**BLUEWING DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION** is a leading construction company specializing in civil engineering projects. With a focus on quality, safety, and innovation, we strive to deliver exceptional results to our clients. We are currently seeking a dynamic and experienced Civil Construction Project Manager to join our team and lead various projects to successful completion.

**Job Description:**

**Position:** Civil Construction Project Manager

**Location:** Ahmedabad On-Site.

**Job Type:** Full-time

**Responsibilities:**

* **Project Planning:** Develop comprehensive project plans, including timelines, resources, and budgets, in collaboration with the project team and stakeholders.
* **Resource Management:** Allocate resources effectively to ensure project milestones are achieved on time and within budget.
* **Contract Management:** Oversee contract negotiations, review terms and conditions, and ensure compliance with contractual agreements throughout the project lifecycle.
* **Risk Assessment and Management:** Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize project disruptions and financial losses.
* **Quality Control:** Implement quality control measures to ensure that work meets industry standards and client expectations.
* **Communication:** Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, subcontractors, and regulatory agencies, maintaining open and transparent communication throughout the project.
* **Team Leadership:** Provide leadership and guidance to project teams, including engineers, contractors, and support staff, to foster a collaborative and productive work environment.
* **Safety Compliance:** Enforce strict adherence to safety protocols and regulations to promote a safe working environment for all project stakeholders.
* **Progress Reporting:** Prepare and present regular progress reports to clients and senior management, highlighting achievements, challenges, and upcoming milestones.
* **Cost Control:** Monitor project expenses closely, identify cost-saving opportunities, and take corrective action as necessary to ensure projects remain within budget.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field. Master's degree preferred.
* Proven experience as a Project Manager in civil construction projects, with a minimum of **10+ years** of relevant experience.
* Strong understanding of construction methods, materials, and techniques, with a focus on civil engineering projects.
* Excellent leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with diverse teams.
* In-depth knowledge of relevant regulations and standards, including building codes, zoning laws, and environmental regulations.

**Application Process:**

If you meet the above qualifications and are interested in joining our team as a Civil Construction Project Manager, please submit your resume and cover letter detailing your relevant experience and accomplishments to [career@bluewingconstruction.com].

Bluewing Design & Construction is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only those selected for an interview will be contacted.

title: Design Engineer
description:
We are Designers & Manufacturers of Special Purpose Machines having our Office & Works in Chikhali, Pune - Maharashtra.

To aid our growth, we are looking for Four Mechanical Design Engineer Trainees – Freshers with Bachelor in Mechanical Engineering of 2021 or 2022 or 2023 batch with around **one or two years’ experience in Solidedge** - to be trained on the following activities. Formal training on Solid Modeling Software in a reputed institute will be an advantage - but self trained candidates proficient in Solid Modeling & doing regular practice will also be considered.

**Candidates with more experience especially in SPM design, please mention in the covering letter so that they can be considered for Sr. Engineer positions.**

The Candidates MUST have, apart from high proficiency in Solid Modeling using Solidedge & regular practice of the software - good theoretical knowledge in Mechanical Design & good grasping power & retention capability.

The Training during 12 months will comprise of

* Study of the design input details and prepare the concept.
* Preparation of Bill of Materials, Costing sheet.
* Making the detailed 3D model on Solidedge
* Prepare the Manufacturing drawings in 2D with complete processing details
* Test the machine, assembled by the Production team, verify the performance and validate the parameters.
* Undertake the inspection by customers / third party, take down the improvement points, carryout the improvements

During the 12 months training period, the candidates will be paid a Stipend of Rs. 14,000 to Rs. 17,000 per month based on their proficiency.

Candidates who have successfully completed the training will be absorbed in the company as Senior Design Engineers at salaries ranging from Rs. 18,000/- to Rs. 22,000/- per month based on their proficiency.

Please apply mentioning your Qualification, experience your current salary, joining time required etc.

title: Civil Engineer
description:
**Overview:**

We are seeking a highly experienced and skilled Civil Engineer to join our team. The Civil Engineer will be responsible for leading and managing civil engineering projects from conception to completion, ensuring adherence to quality standards, budgetary constraints, and regulatory requirements.

**Responsibilities:**

* Lead and oversee civil engineering projects, including site development, infrastructure, and structural design.
* Develop project plans, schedules, and budgets, and monitor progress to ensure timely and cost-effective completion.
* Coordinate with clients, architects, contractors, and other stakeholders to define project requirements and objectives.
* Conduct site investigations and surveys, analyze data, and provide recommendations for design and construction improvements.
* Prepare and review engineering designs, drawings, specifications, and calculations in accordance with applicable codes and standards.
* Manage and mentor junior engineers and technical staff, providing guidance and support throughout the project lifecycle.
* Ensure compliance with regulatory agencies, building codes, zoning laws, and environmental regulations.
* Conduct risk assessments and implement mitigation strategies to minimize project risks and ensure safety.
* Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to integrate civil engineering solutions with other project components.
* Evaluate and recommend new technologies, materials, and construction methods to improve project efficiency and sustainability.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in civil engineering or a related field; master's degree preferred.
* Professional Engineer (PE) license required.
* Minimum of 7 years of experience in civil engineering, with a proven track record of successfully delivering projects of varying complexity.
* Extensive knowledge of civil engineering principles, practices, and techniques, with expertise in site development, infrastructure design, and construction management.
* Proficiency in AutoCAD, Civil 3D, and other relevant engineering software.
* Strong project management skills, including the ability to plan, organize, and prioritize tasks effectively.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with internal teams and external stakeholders.
* Analytical mindset with strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
* Demonstrated leadership abilities, with experience mentoring and developing junior staff.
* Ability to work independently and make sound decisions in a fast-paced environment.

title: Site Engineer
description:
**C. Field Quality Control Engineer**

**BE (Civil Engineering)** 

**5 year total experience**

**3 year Water Supply experience**

**Job Roles:**

a) To review Quality Assurance Quality Control (QAQC) system of the SQC team and monitor if the ongoing work on site as per approved designs, drawings, specifications in line with approved QAQC plan.

b) To update/highlight the team and Client any non-conformity to the QAQC.

c) Check the measurements recorded in the Measurement Book are in sync with the actual progress of work on site and per agreed contract.

d) Witness start-up, testing and commissioning as per detailed specifications and contract conditions;

e) To inspect the works, during the construction period.

f) Ensure that the SQC establishes a system of Quality Control & Quality Assurance of works, approval of materials, concrete mix designs, sampling and testing procedure and check implementation of the same.

g) To interact with SQC/GM/DGM regularly.

h) To check measurements as per TOR and issue monthly/interim payment certificates;

i) All other duties assigned by the Team Leader and GM/DGM.

j) In case of works where measurements are hidden after completion, as in the case of

foundations, reinforcements in RCC structures, etc, check measurements are to be carried out immediately after each activity is completed and before they are covered up.

k) Witness/Check the laboratory and field test carried out by the contractor, ensure proper record and testing of cubes as required.

l) check all quantity measurements and calculations required for payment purpose.

The above tasks are indicative and further tasks may be allotted to the experts by Client / Team Leader depending on the requirements of the projects / schemes. The above tasks are to be delivered by the TPIA as a whole and non-deployment / absence of some members of the TPIA team shall not be considered as a reason for non-delivery of any aspects of the Services as envisaged under the Contract. It is the responsibility of the TPIA to ensure delivery of the entire scope of work as envisaged under the Contract at all times during the contract period.

title: Site Engineer
description:
**Job Role**

1. HAVE 5 YEARS ON SITE PROPER EXPERIENCE.

2. PLAN LABOUR ALLOCATION WITH SITE INCHARGE FOR THE DAY AS PER TARGETS GIVEN BY THE SENIOR MANAGEMENT

3. POST ATTENDANCE REPORTS IN GROUP

4. MAKE SURE LABOUR REPORT IS IN GROUP BY 11AM AND THAT SITE SUPERVISOR DOESN’T PUT ANYTHING FALSE IN IT.

5. ENSURE CLEANLINESS OF WORK

6. ENSURE QUALITY OF WORK

7. ENSURE PROGRESS AND MEETING TARGETS AS PER PLAN GIVEN BY SENIOR MANAGEMENT

8. ENSURE WORKS HAPPENING AS PER DRAWING, IF ANY ERROR IN DRAWING REPORT IN ARCHITECT WHATSAPP GROUP

9. THERE SHOULD ALWAYS BE A LIST OF PENDING DRAWINGS LIST SOFTBOARD SHALL BE UPDATED WEEKLY

10. THERE SHOULD BE MONTHLY WORKPLAN ON SOFTBOARD SHALL BE UPDATED EVERY 14 DAYS WITH GREEN HIGHLIGHT FOR SUCCESFUL COMPLETION AND RED HIGHLIGHT FOR FAILURE TO ACHIVE TARGETS WITH REASON.

11. ENSURE PROPER FILING OF ALL DOCUMENTS RELATED TO ENGINEERING, DRAWINGS WITH INDEX BLOCK WISE, WORK ORDERS, CUBE TESTS, ETC. A LIST OF FILES SHALL BE ON BLUE SOFTBOARD.

12. BE IN CONTACT WITH ARCHITECT FOR ISSUANCE OF ALL DRAWINGS

13. MAKE WEEKLY REPORT OF HINDRANCES AT SITE TO BE DISCUSSED AND SOLVED ON SATURDAY EVERYDAY, A FILE OR REGISTER SHALL BE MAINTAINED WITH SIGN OF ANYONE FROM SENIOR MANAGEMENT AND ARCHITECH EVERY WEEK.

14. CONTRACTOR BILLING BY LUNCH EVERY FRIDAY FOR TIMELY PAYMENTS.

15. ENSURE QUALITY OF MATERIALS

16. GIVING REQUIREMENTS FOR ALL MATERIALS VIA SOFTWARE IN A SINGLE FORMAT 7 DAYS IN ADVANCE IN CASE OF NON CIVIL MATERIALS AND 2 DAYS IN ADVANCE IN CASE OF CIVIL MATERIALS IN WHATSAPP GROUP.

17. MATERIAL USED REPORT BY 7PM EVERYDAY

18. DAILY PROGRESS REPORT AT THE END OF DAYS WORK EVERYDAY WITH LABOUR COST/AMOUNT EVERYDAY

19. MACHNE REPORT EVERYDAY

20. IF ANY CONTRACOR IS DOING NIGHT THEN COORDINATE AND KEEP CHECK.

21. LUNCH 1 HOUR

22. IF WORK AFTER 7 THEN SNCAKS PROVIDED BY COMPNAY

23. NO WEEKLY OR MONTHLY LEAVES IF ACCOMODATION/TRAVEL/FOOD PROVIDED BY COMPANY

* Perform design coordination based on requirements.
* Prepare documents such as project reports, necessary correspondence, minutes of meetings, and presentations.
* Liaison with project consultants, project clients, and other stakeholders to schedule meetings, appointments, and other tasks.
* Maintain files and records, both physical and electronic.
* Abilities to evaluate, select and apply standard engineering techniques, procedures and criteria to meet basic engineering and construction specifications.
* Perform procurement management, contract drafting and evaluation of bid documents, related coordination.


**Attributes:**


* Bachelor’s in construction technology (SBST)/Civil Engineering/ Master’s in Construction Engineering Management/ Master’s in Infrastructure Management.
* Exhibits sound communication skills.
* Possess excellent problem-solving and analytical abilities.
* Proficiency in AutoCAD, MS Office Suite, and similar software.


**Outcomes:**


* Successful completion of projects.
* Strong and efficient project management processes.


**Experience:** Minimum three years in building or infrastructure projects.

  


**Location:** Ahmedabad


**Apply at:** reshmashah@cept.ac.in before 15h March 2023 with a detailed CV and portfolio.


**Remuneration:** As per industry standards

title: Assistant Engineer
description:
As an Assistant Engineer – Civil Structures, you will be part of the HKiCRC team in WSP India and operate out of our Bengaluru office. The ideal candidate for this role would be from a Civil/Structural Engineering background with hands-on professional experience in design and documentation of structural works associated with Civil Infrastructure projects.


You will be supporting multi-disciplinary, geographically spread teams working on projects principally in Hong Kong and across the APAC region. You will be tasked with analysis, calculations & design of RC and steel structures, design documentation including preparation of BIM models, drawings, and specifications etc., as well as writing technical reports.


Responsibilities

* Assist the lead engineer in projects primarily pertaining to civil structures, including reinforced concrete / steel bridges & associated structures, foundation sub-structures, underpasses, carriageways, tunnels, noise barriers and temporary works (including excavation & lateral support, temporary steel platforms) etc.
* Produce and review research, analysis and coordination of designs, calculations, contract documentation, specifications, schedules, construction estimates and drawings suitable for construction.
* Focus on and proactively help in the development, promotion and adoption of digital engineering tools, processes and workflows for enhanced level of care and delivery efficiency.
* Undertake appropriate verification and validation of deliverable, self-check own work and peer review team members’ work as necessary.
* Take ownership of assigned tasks and deliver under minimal supervision; Assist the team lead in resource and pipeline management.
* Ensure safety in design and maintain data and information security.
* Keep up to date with developments in the relevant professional area.
* Thrive in and enthusiastically contribute to a performance focussed team culture, incorporating WSP values and adapt to multi-cultural project teams across geographies and time zones.
* Communicate across functionally diverse groups at all levels of managerial and technical domains within a global organization; Consistently demonstrate flexibility, diplomacy and entrepreneurship.
* Contribute on an on-going basis toward maintaining a safe working environment both for yourself and for those working with you or in your close vicinity; Ensure that confidentiality is respected, and proper work ethics are maintained at all times.


Key Competencies


Mandatory Skills

* Knowledge of relevant design codes, standards, legislation and practices in civil/structural engineering. Familiarity with engineering principles and best practices in concrete and steel structural design; Prior knowledge of Hong Kong / British / European standards and best practices.
* General technical proficiency in structural engineering associated with civil infrastructure projects and demonstrable understanding of the underlying principles.
* Experience in structural engineering analysis and design software (e.g. SAP2000, SAFE, Midas etc.). Hands-on proficiency in CAD/BIM software and ability to develop modelling and documentation of reinforced concrete & steel designs is preferred.
* Appreciation of technical risks; Ability to manage and communicate the same with the project team and/or client.
* Good report-writing skills; Excellent quantitative and analytical skills, and proven ability to communicate results orally and in writing; ability to interact meaningfully with peers & clients with teams in lead region.
* Fast learner with good learning attitude.


Desired Skills

* Experience across a range of projects in the transport & civil infrastructure domain; Experience in Hong Kong projects will be an advantage.
* Appetite to build knowledge in relevant Hong Kong design codes, standards, legislation and practices.
* Ability to apply best health & safety practices & behaviour to offer sound engineering design & construction solutions; ability to leverage appropriate problem-solving techniques and analysis.

title: Senior Civil Engineer
description:
The profile that we are seeking is for the role of Senior Engineer - Civil Projects with Pipeline Experience and MEP experience of 6-8 years having high initiative. The brief of roles and responsibilities is given below.

Accountable for delivery of new projects within the defined timelines, budget and the scope and deliver the desired results.

Manage the projects from start to finish. Initiate and innovate new / better ways of getting the things done. Should be good at Project Management with high initiative.

Strategic planning with expertise in executing projects from concept to launch with focus on project scope & rendering end to end solution.

Overseeing project activities from conceptualization to execution including finalization of Master Layout, technical specifications, tendering, and procurement/supply of equipment, stage inspections, scheduling, progress monitoring and manpower planning.

Formulating and managing the Construction Schedule, Progress Report, Client & Contractor Billing, Reconciliation of Construction Materials, Cash Flow, Cost Planning, Extension of Time (EOT), Project Report & Documentation.

Ensure that all the projects are being executed with high class safety standards.

Conduct and participate in review meeting regarding milestone achievements & submitting progress report to management.

Identifying project bottlenecks and undertaking corrective measures.

Participating in technical & commercial comparisons, analysis of quotations, evaluation of BOQ/Budgetary costing.

Work Location: Mundra, Gujarat

Experience required: 6-8 years in Executing projects pertaining to water pipeline, plumbing and other civil works.

Mail your resume to careers@malaxmi.in
